section.title: Echo
section.para: Use the <echo> action to print messages to the console/logger. This function can be useful when debugging test runs. The property "message" holds the text to be printed out. Common use will be to print out debug messages and variables as shown in this example:
section.programlisting:
<testcase name="echoTest"> <variables> <variable name="time" value="citrus:currentDate()"/> </variables> <actions> <echo> <message>Hello Test Framework</message> </echo>
<echo> <message>Current time is: ${time}</message> </echo> </actions> </testcase>
